inclusion.criterion: treated with growth hormone for at least two years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: age range: Boys 7 years to 12 years, Girls 7 years to 11 years
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients receiving growth hormone for other reasons
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: children who began signs of puberty (Tanner 2 or higher)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 41-year-old man and a known case of Acromegaly who underwent transsphenoidal surgery 4 months ago. He came to the clinic for the follow up lab studies after his primary resection surgery.
